Drones only pick up resources from buildings when the amount stored is equal or greater then their carry amount.
This forces them to pick up whenever there's more then one resource).

If you have an insane production amount set then it'll take an (in-game) hour between calling drones.

Each Sol goes through all buildings and sorts their cc list by nearest.

Takes less then a second on a map with 3616 buildings and 54 drone hubs.

Extracts Files.hpk to "%s".
You can then edit the files for use with ECM, or your mod (don't forget to include my LICENSE file).

Extract will make ECM use lua files in "%s" instead of Files.hpk.
ECM files contained within will be overwritten (easier for me when there's an update).
Clean up will remove "%sTheIncal.tga", and ECM will go back to using Files.hpk.

Restart ECM for any changes to take effect.
When ECM version is changed "Clean up" will occur.
